note:
I’m on Frontend Dev. Career Path.
 I have decided to change my profession, again. After some 16 years I’m going back to the front web development. Is it hard and challenging? Yes it is. Am I old? No, actually I still have some 15 years of work in front of me.
 Most importantly, it is inspiring and fun again. I have to learn a lot of new stuff.  BTW… natively, I dream in Bosnian... The dispute about the existence of such language is available somewhere, but not here.
